channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 2 pot holes on the this roundabout entrance coming from Brockworth. Still haven't been filled in., 29th April
item.description:
By the Subway restaurant
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crosshands Roundabout, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant worsening of clanking drain., 29th April
item.description:
The drain cover outside 156 London Road has significantly worsened following the 2 week detour of HGV's/traffic onto London Road. Contact attempts to Highways ignored for 2 weeks, no contact offered to Severn Trent regarding the issue. It's causing severe sleep deprivation (torture method) and it has been worsening since last year. Both organizations involved refuse to take responsibility and fix the problem. This is a 'statutory nuisance' (Environmental Protection Act 1990) causing severe impacts to mental and physical heath from long term sleep deprivation and the consequences of that.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 129, London Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole extending in lenght and obliterating the double yellow lines., 28th April
item.description:
Near to the Chapel, Chapel cafe and Chinese Take-a-way. The double yellow lines are gone and so people park their cars on a regular basis on a daily basis, the junction is dangerous and narrow!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Church Street, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Abandoned horse box, 28th April
item.description:
On Oakland street outside the side entrance to the London inn, has been there for around 4 months not sure if it’s taxed or who it belongs to. It hasn’t moved but makes parking on the street harder for those who live here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Oakland Street, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Intermittent fault on pushbutton, 28th April
item.description:
The pushbutton on the control box on the southerly side (Market St side) of the pedestrian crossing here seems to have a fault, which may be getting worse. A few weeks ago I pressed the button and it turned red, but a good while later the lights still hadn't changed, and I noticed the red light around the button had gone out, so I had to press it _again_. Yesterday I kept a close eye on it, and the red light extinguished _four_ times, i.e. I had to press the button _five_ times before the crossing actually stopped the traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Gloucester Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 106, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Bin lorry has damaged the pavement, 28th April
item.description:
On the pavement outside 87 Millham Road. This is the third time the bin lorry has damaged the pavement outside my house In less than 12 months.

item.title: Blocked drain, 28th April
item.description:
The drain pictured here is blocked as are a number of drains that are located around the roundabout. Would be good if all were looked at in the locality as must of the road gullies are already full of leave litter a mere couple of months since the road was resurfaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 28th April
item.description:
On Montpellier Spa Road near the one entrance to the pathway of the gardens there is a blocked drain causing a flood of up to 20 meters regularly reaching the middle of the carriageway causing cyclists to head into oncoming traffic when turning left.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Spa Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 28th April
item.description:

item.title: Blocked drain, 28th April
item.description:
The drain outside the church is blocked following the road being resurfaced upwards of 2 years ago. It seems to be blocked with tarmac and regularly floods the crossing area. It may have been reported back in late 2023 and still it hasn't been sorted out which is a concern considering it's location.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Saint James Square, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
